mapper.sql: SELECT u.id, u.email, u.password, u.name, u.phone, u.gender, ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM carts c INNER JOIN cart_items ci ON c.id = ci.cart_id WHERE c.user_id = u.id ) AS cart_count, u.created_at, u.updated_at, ua.authority_id FROM users u INNER JOIN user_authorities ua ON u.id = ua.user_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO users(email, password, name, phone, gender) VALUES(#{email}, #{password}, #{name}, #{phone}, #{gender})
mapper.select: SELECT id, user_id, created_at, updated_at FROM carts WHERE user_id = #{userId}
mapper.update: UPDATE carts SET updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT id, cart_id, product_size_id, quantity, created_at FROM cart_items WHERE cart_id = #{cartId} and product_size_id = #{productSizeId}
mapper.update: UPDATE cart_items SET quantity = #{quantity} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cart_items (cart_id, product_size_id, quantity) VALUES (#{cartId}, #{productSizeId}, 1)
mapper.select: SELECT ci.id, ci.cart_id, ci.product_size_id, ci.quantity, ci.created_at, p.id AS product_id, p.category_id, p.name AS product_name, p.price, pi.image_url, pi.alt_text, ps.color, ps.size FROM carts c INNER JOIN cart_items ci ON c.id = ci.cart_id INNER JOIN product_sizes ps ON ps.id = ci.product_size_id INNER JOIN products p ON p.id = ps.product_id INNER JOIN product_images pi ON p.id = pi.product_id WHERE c.user_id = #{userId} AND pi.sort_order = 1
